title: Fatty liver.
summary: Fatty liver is increasingly becoming more problematic from a clinical perspective. This article describes fatty liver and its clinical presentation. The current understanding of processes underlying fatty liver is reviewed, as well as the â€¦
abstract: Fatty liver is increasingly becoming more problematic from a clinical perspective. This article describes fatty liver and its clinical presentation. The current understanding of processes underlying fatty liver is reviewed, as well as the evidence for therapeutic options.
